person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Van Boxmeer said Zywiec had its eye on Okocim , which has said it would start producing Carlsberg beer next year , but that Zywiec 's potential production of Heineken was a medium-term possibility rather than a short-term one .

| Person |
|--------|

| Zywiec |
| Okocim |

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
|--------|

| Zywiec |

These are the valid entities that refer to persons in the paragraph. Other entities such as "Okocim" and "Carlsberg beer" do not clearly refer to persons.
